member.summary: Displays the main menu options.

member.summary: Runs the main menu of the Inventory Management System CLI.

member.summary: Prompts the user for login credentials and attempts to log in.

member.summary: Registers a new user by collecting required information.

member.summary: Prompts the user to enter their username.
member.returns: The username entered by the user.

member.name: M:inventoryMSCli.CLI.MainPage.GetPassword
member.summary: Prompts the user to enter their password without showing it on the console.
member.returns: The password entered by the user.
